K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:1b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i buddha kshe tra gu na by'u ha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:1b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:1b-5: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:1b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-0: bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong @2a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-1: stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-5: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-6: mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-7: thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-8: lha bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2a-9: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-0: mi mjed kyi bdag po @2b tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-3: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-4: lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-5: lha ma yin gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-6: lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-7: lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang g-yog lha ma yin brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-8: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-10: klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-11: klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-12: klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-13: klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-15: klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-16: klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:2b-17: klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-1: po zla ba'i bla ma la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-3: rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-4: rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-5: rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-6: rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-7: rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang g-yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-8: gnod sbyin kum bi ra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-17: gnod sbyin gzhan brgya stong dang yang thabs cig go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3a-18: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por nye bar gnas shing bzhugs te lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-7: mi ma yin pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-8: 'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-10: rim gror byas nas mchod cing gsol te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-18: yo byad bzang po mang po brnyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-19: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-22: dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-23: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-24: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-25: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos me tog autpa la dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-27: padma dkar po'i char chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-30: bkrol nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim du bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:3b-31: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-0: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas zhabs gang dang gang du bzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der padma shing rta'i 'phang lo @4a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-8: nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa rnams byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-9: padma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag padma de dag dang bcas te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du bskor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-11: skye bo rnams la phan mdzad ded dpon gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-12: yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnams mdzad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-13: sh'akya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-14: 'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-15: lha yi gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-16: de bzhin rga dang 'chi las thar 'dod dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-17: bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-18: des ni sh'akya sengge mchod par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-19: 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-20: bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnam spyod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-21: thub pa rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-22: thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-23: zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-24: bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-25: sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4a-26: kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-0: @4b lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-1: sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-2: kun btang yon tan ldan pa gtong phod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-3: des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-4: sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslab cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-5: skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-6: bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-7: zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-8: sdug bsngal bying pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-9: brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-10: bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-11: tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-12: drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-13: mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-14: bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-15: spyod pa dang ni rnam par smin pas sbyangs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-16: blo ldan gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-17: mi g-yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-18: chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-19: chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-20: mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa'i sku //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-21: bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-22: snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bzhag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-23: mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thad du song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-24: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-25: de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:4b-26: de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-0: mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas @5a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-2: tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-3: brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-4: lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtse dga' ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-5: de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-6: gling bzhi'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-7: rin chen mchog bdun rang gis thob pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-8: bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-9: sems can mchog la des myur mchod par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-10: khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-11: mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g-yog 'khor dam pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-12: longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-13: de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-14: gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-15: thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-16: 'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-17: de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur dengs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-18: de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-21: bu mo rnams me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-24: byug pa dang phye ma'i phur ma thogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5a-26: dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-1: pi wang rgyud gcig pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-7: pi wang thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-9: mchog tu dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g-yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-11: lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-12: lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-13: sems can long ba rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-17: sems can smyon pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-19: sems can yid brel ba rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-21: sems can gcer bu rnams ni; gos rnyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-22: sems can bkres pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-24: sems can dbul po rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-26: de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de; zhe sdang gis ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:5b-31: da rgyal gyis ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-1: thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-2: phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-3: phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-4: de la 'di skad ces bya ste; sangs rgyas skyes bu sengge che //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-5: stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-6: de yi mod la skye bo rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-7: bde ba rgya cher dri med thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-8: long bas mig rnams mthong bar gyur; ;'on ba thos pa'i mthu yang skyes //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-9: myos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-10: yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-11: gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-12: bkres pa dag gis zas thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-13: skyes bu gang su dbul po yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-14: dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-15: lha rnams bye ba mang po yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-16: mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-17: smra ba'i sengge mchod pa'i phyir; ;me tog char kyang rab tu 'bebs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-18: rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-19: nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-20: sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-22: grong khyer kun tu rab g-yos te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-23: de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-24: skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-25: dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-26: 'dod chags kyis ni mi gzir zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-27: de tshe khro blun ser sna med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-28: nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-29: gzir ba de tshe ma lus med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-30: dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6a-31: mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-0: @6b gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-1: skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-2: mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-3: ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-4: 'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-5: bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-6: de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-7: 'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-8: de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-9: rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-11: tshong dpon shing s'a la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-12: byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-16: dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog brnyes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-17: dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-19: glang po ltar dbang po thul ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-20: mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-21: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-22: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par brgyan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-23: kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-24: mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:6b-25: de sems shin tu dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo @7a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-1: bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-2: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-5: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-9: skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-10: phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-11: bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-12: bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7a-13: zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems @7b dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-3: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to; ;chos gcig po gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-7: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje che zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-8: de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-10: lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-11: gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-16: khyim pa'i rtags la sred pa mi spyod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-17: rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-19: tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-20: gang rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-21: de la rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:7b-23: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-0: chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang @8a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-2: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-7: 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so; ;phung po lnga rab tu rtags pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-8: phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-13: ma 'gag par rab tu rtogs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-14: ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-15: gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-16: mi shes; rlom sems su mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-18: rnam par mi rtogs pa de'i tshe rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-19: phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-20: gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de; chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-23: rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-24: de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-25: sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-27: des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8a-30: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-0: myur du bla na med pa yang dag par @8b rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-6: mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-7: 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-8: lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye rgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-9: chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-13: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-14: kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:8b-21: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-0: de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par @9a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-1: byas nas slar log ste bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-3: bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-4: chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-5: 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la mnga'; ;khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-6: ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-7: thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-8: de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-9: da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-10: ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-11: rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-12: sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-13: chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-14: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-15: lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te; ;skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-16: skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9a-17: thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-0: khyod ni ye shes pha @9b rol phyin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-1: khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-2: spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-3: ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-4: bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-5: chos rnams 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-6: de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-7: dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-8: khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-9: rab tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-10: skye bo mang po the tshom 'tshal ba kun //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-11: thub pa der 'dir the tshom myur gcad gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:9b-23: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-0: bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de @10a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-1: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-4: da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-5: nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-6: byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thu bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-8: bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-9: dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dag la 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-10: de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-11: dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bdag nyid lag bdar te bza' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-14: myang ba bzang po mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10a-15: dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-0: bstabs @10b te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-1: lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-2: sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te stan ran pa zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-4: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-10: mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-11: mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-16: nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-22: nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-27: nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:10b-29: mi shes pa zhes gdags par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-0: khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro @11a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-2: gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-5: gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-8: 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-9: gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-10: shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-13: nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-14: gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-15: nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-17: ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-18: gal te bdag par skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-19: bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-0: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar @11b mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-3: chos yang dag pa rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:11b-5: nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-0: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do; ;'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig @12a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-4: rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-5: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12a-6: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-0: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag @12b 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-1: de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-2: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-4: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bka' stsal na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-6: ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-8: bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-9: gzhan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:12b-10: nyon mongs pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong @13a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-2: smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-3: shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-4: sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-5: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-8: sems can dpag tu ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-9: grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-12: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer pa 'dus shing mchis pa rnams bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-13: mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-15: mchog tu dga' ba thob nas ji ltar thos pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-17: 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13a-19: ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-0: 'od zer re @13b res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-2: de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gi dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-3: lha rnams kyi 'od kyang mi mngon /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-10: sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-11: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor yug gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-15: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-16: de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-17: de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-20: nags tshal de dag thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-21: snyam du dgongs so; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer bkye nas gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:13b-22: gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-0: yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa @14a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-1: na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang mi grag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re re la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-6: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14a-7: byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags te lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-0: de nas byang chub @14b sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-4: 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-5: bshad pa yang grag la sgra yang 'byin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-6: gzugs yongs su grub pa yang mi snang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-7: sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-8: gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no; ;snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-9: de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-10: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-12: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-13: mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-14: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:14b-16: snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-5: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-8: chos bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-0: bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @15b bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la yang blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-4: chos de yang nyan du mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-5: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-7: khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug khri sum stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-10: skyes bu stobs po ches lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-11: brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di me tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:15b-14: sil snyan brgya stong gi sgra yang byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-3: ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-4: spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-5: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-7: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i padma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do; ;yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gangg'a'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sengge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-0: yang sangs rgyas @16b kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-1: byang chub sems dpa' de ci'i phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-2: yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-3: chos rin po che'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-4: dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-10: shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-14: btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-16: gzhan yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-17: de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-18: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:16b-19: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-0: mthong zhing thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu @17a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-2: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i rtsal gyi bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-4: snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-6: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-8: byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gangg'a'i klung dgu cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-9: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17a-12: dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'di ltar dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi @17b rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-1: der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das sengge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-4: bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-7: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de la yang blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-8: chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-9: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-11: khyod der song ste ci rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-15: gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:17b-19: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig @18a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-4: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-7: zhes yun ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-10: de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-15: bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-17: 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-18: de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-0: de bzhin @18b gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-2: de mthong ba yang rnyed par dka'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-3: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rmas par 'gyur gyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-22: bdag ci'i slad du rmas par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-24: bdag la sems can thams cad kyis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal bar gshe zhing spyo ste brdegs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:18b-25: mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-1: bzhin gshegs pa sengge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-3: khyed las gang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ba de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der dengs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-4: bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-5: bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o; ;zhes gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19a-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-0: sems can tshad @19b med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-1: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa g-yas pas bkab nas lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-2: btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-3: de bzhin du bzhon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-12: su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-13: sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las chos thos par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-14: de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:19b-15: sems can gang nad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-1: lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i padma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-2: yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gangg'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-7: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20a-13: de dag gis bee d'urya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-0: shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du @20b byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bee d'urya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag la lung ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-3: de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-5: bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-6: nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-7: me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-8: zla bar mngon par yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-9: nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba zhig gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:20b-11: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21a-3: snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21a-5: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21b-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21b-8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:21b-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-2: sems can gang dag bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa yi dvags dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-3: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-4: gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang skom pa dang bral zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-5: bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-7: dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-8: skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-19: gnod sems kyis gzir ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-20: 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22a-21: phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:22b-7: byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon zhing skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-0: bcom ldan 'das de yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs @23a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-1: rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-2: de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-3: gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-4: de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-7: gtong ba rjes su gtong ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-8: stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-9: mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-10: smon pa med pa tshol ba; rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-13: skye mched rab tu rtogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-14: 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-15: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa de la mngon par dad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-16: chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa de dag la yongs su rtog pa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-17: rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23a-18: sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23b-6: bcom ldan 'das; snang ba chen po 'di dang gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23b-8: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:23b-11: lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @24a *//
