K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-5: chos bsgrag pa'i phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-7: ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-8: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-10: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-13: sdug bsngal la mi mjed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-14: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-17: sems can de dag las la la spyos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-18: mi snyan par brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-20: brdegs pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa ma mchis sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-21: 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24a-22: de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-0: gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis @24b sam; bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-12: gti mug gis kun tu dkris so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-15: mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-16: gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-21: mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-25: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-26: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-27: sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-30: nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-32: sems can thams cad kyis spyos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-34: mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:24b-37: gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-0: skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gis 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces @25a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de yang de na sems can kha cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-7: dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-12: phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spyos shing smad de gnod par byas shing skur kyang bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-13: de snying rje che bas bzod cing dang du len te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-14: sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-15: khong khro ba med pas de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-16: bsti stang du ma byas kyang 'dud par mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-17: de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-23: de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-0: 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du smad pa'i sems @25b ngan rnams kyi nang du ma skyes pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-1: bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-2: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-4: khyod de skad ma zer cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-7: byang dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-13: 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-14: sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-16: 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-17: gang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-18: de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:25b-19: gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa s'a la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems @26a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-3: bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-6: byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-7: chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-8: bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-9: khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26b-0: bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas de de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong @26b gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26b-1: rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26b-3: mu tig gi rgyan phreng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26b-6: ba dan brgya stong mngon par 'phyang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:26b-7: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-0: mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so; ;de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya @27a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-1: thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-2: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i padma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-3: de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-4: gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-5: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27a-6: gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-0: rgyal po chen po 'jig rten @27b skyong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-1: de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-2: gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-4: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa ji snyed pa de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-6: mchu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa yang de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:27b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-1: sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-2: longs spyod dang kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-3: bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-5: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-6: phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-7: 'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-8: thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-9: tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-10: phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-11: chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-12: bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-13: smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28a-14: phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-0: tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin @28b blo rnams kyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-1: sengge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-2: nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-3: lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-4: dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge slong ma; ;thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-5: bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-6: khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-7: da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-8: lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-9: the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-10: thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-11: zhing rnams dag pa rdul med 'thob par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-12: ji ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur ba //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-13: de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-14: ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-15: ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-16: bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-17: brnyas pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-18: sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-19: 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-20: bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-21: ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-22: rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-23: bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:28b-24: padma chu yi nyes pas mi gos ltar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-0: ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos @29a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-2: thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-3: mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-4: brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-5: byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-8: khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan bting du bcug ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-12: gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-13: moonggal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-14: de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding du bcug pa las na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29a-16: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i @29b gtam zhig 'byung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-3: chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sengge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-6: rin po che du mas spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-7: lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-8: shing bal 'jam zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-9: ;de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs nas sengge'i khri de la bzhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-10: bcom ldan 'das sengge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-17: byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-18: sems can la snying rje ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:29b-20: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-1: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-3: sh'a ri'i bu; gzhan yang chos gcig dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-5: chos gcig po gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-7: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-9: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad ces /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-10: gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu ma byung na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-11: sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-16: skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30a-18: ma byung yang rung gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-0: 'di @30b lta ste; khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-3: rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-6: 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-7: dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-8: sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-11: bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-12: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-13: bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-14: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-16: de la lha rnams dga' ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-17: de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-19: rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-22: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-23: sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pas rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-24: mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:30b-26: chos gcig po de dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-1: smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-3: gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-4: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-7: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-8: nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-9: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi bsten /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-10: nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-12: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-13: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-14: gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-16: de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31a-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa @31b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-1: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrog cing chos ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-5: tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po bskyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-6: mir gyur na yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-7: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-8: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-9: g-yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-10: bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-13: gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-14: rang sang rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-15: gang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-17: de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-21: rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-22: sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:31b-25: rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-1: yod na; sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-3: rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-5: gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-6: gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-8: chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-9: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-12: gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-13: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-16: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-17: zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-18: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-20: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-22: gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-23: mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32a-24: mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-0: mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug @32b pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-1: mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-3: mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-4: mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-9: yo byad la spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-10: des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-12: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-14: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-15: yon tan gyi chos bcu yongs su 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-17: gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-18: de shes kyis khe mi 'dod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-19: de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-20: de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-21: de khyim la ser sna med pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-26: yo byad ngan mngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-27: des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-28: lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-29: de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:32b-30: de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-0: zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @33a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-6: gang 'di 'du 'dzin rnam par spong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-7: rab tu dben pa la brten pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-8: de bsam gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-9: bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-13: tshegs [*tshogs?] chung ngus ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-14: des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33a-15: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-0: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa @33b de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-3: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden pa smra ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-4: ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-5: nga rgyal tshar gcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-6: pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-9: bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-12: de'i kha nas autpa la'i dri ngad 'byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-13: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-14: lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul ba med par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-15: sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:33b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon yin no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-0: gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba @34a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-5: nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-11: de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-12: mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-13: de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-14: de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-17: phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-24: bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag bde ba la sbyar bar bya ba yin no /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-26: rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-27: zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34a-28: de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-1: bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' ba rnams kyis mi 'phrog par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-2: gang gi tshe bu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-3: g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-4: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-5: sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-7: kun tu spyod pa rgya chen po la sems 'jug pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-10: pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-12: chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-13: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-15: gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-16: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:34b-19: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-0: de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa de kun @35a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-1: 'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-3: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-5: de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon bde dang der skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-6: de der skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-7: nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-9: longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-10: des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas; zhes dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-11: byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-13: gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35a-14: yang dag par rab tu 'chad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-0: des de @35b thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-2: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-3: bya ba dang ldan pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-4: de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-9: ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-10: gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-11: ye shes te; nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-12: bya ba zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-13: ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-15: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-21: gang 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-22: gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-24: tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-25: de la tshul bzhin sbyor ba gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-26: gang 'di chos thams cad yid la byed pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-27: 'byung ba yang de nyid yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-29: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-30: zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:35b-31: de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid gang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-2: sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-4: zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo; ;gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-5: ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-7: chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na; byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g-yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-9: gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-10: byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-11: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-13: sh'a ri'i bu; 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-14: sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36a-15: de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de yongs su gtong yang zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-0: yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar @36b gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-2: bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-3: kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-6: des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-8: srog yongs su gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-9: gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang; chung ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-11: bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-14: gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-16: gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-17: de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-18: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-20: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa yang rung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-21: rab tu byung ba yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-22: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:36b-23: de srog gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-1: pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-4: zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-5: mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-6: de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-7: de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-8: chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-9: yang dag par so sor rtogs pa la gnas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-10: zab mo la bzod pa skye'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-14: yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-15: yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-16: khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-17: de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-19: 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37a-20: ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-0: bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan @37b med do; ;snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-1: de de ltar so sor rtog pa na snying rje chen po 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-2: de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-3: gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-5: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-6: nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-10: bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-14: gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang bdag gi gnod sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-15: tha ba dang; zhe sdang gis sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la slob par 'dod pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-21: snyam nas de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spyos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-23: brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-24: bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:37b-25: bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-1: 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-2: bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-4: zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-6: de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-8: gang 'di la rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-9: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-10: gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-11: g-yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-12: gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-13: dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-14: chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-15: chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-16: shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-17: mthong nas kyang dad pa thob pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-19: bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-20: phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38a-22: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing yi dam la brtan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-0: gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar @38b yang 'khor bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-7: snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar byas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-8: 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-12: tshul 'di dang stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-13: byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-14: snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-15: de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-17: brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpas yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:38b-20: des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-1: pa yongs su bzung ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-2: des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-3: des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-4: sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-8: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-12: ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-13: nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-15: brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-16: yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-18: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-21: rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-22: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-23: snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-24: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-27: gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39a-28: gnas 'di thob par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-0: snyam nas @39b de chags pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-1: yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-6: grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-9: khyim la sred pa thams cad yongs su btang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-10: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-11: bdag gis yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-12: snyam nas dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-13: bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyogs gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-14: de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-15: byams pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:39b-17: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang rab tu dben pa 'dod cing dgon pa logs su phyogs te gom @40a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-3: de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-4: ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-8: bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-11: dran pa dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-12: blo gros dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-13: rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-14: mos pa dang ldan pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-15: myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-17: skye ba dang 'jig pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-18: tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-19: lha rnams kyang de la rim gro byed pa yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-20: gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-23: dben pa la gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-25: gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa la mkhas pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-26: de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas 'byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40a-29: tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-0: shes rab byung ba las chos @40b dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-1: snyam nas de shes rab la slob ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-2: gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-7: sgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-8: bslab nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-9: gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-11: 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-14: mngon par shes par ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-15: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-17: mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-18: 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam pa de lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-19: sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-20: sman rnam pa de lta bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-21: shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-22: snyam nas de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-23: de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol ba na chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-24: yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:40b-25: rab tu zhi bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongs su yid mi 'chad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-1: sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-2: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam bzhin du srid pa 'dzin te; sh'a ri'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-3: chos drug po de dag dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-4: byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-5: 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-7: gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-8: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:41a-11: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:46a-0: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong so so'i stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis @46a *//

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:47a-1: ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:47b-0: khyod kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na med pa yang dag par @47b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-3: de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-4: bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-6: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-7: snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-8: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-13: gang du bsngo snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-15: rgyal po de sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-17: de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-19: khyod kyi bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:53b-21: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-0: de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' de @54a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-2: mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-5: byang chub las phyir mi ldog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-7: lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongs su shes te sgra bsgrags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-10: de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das de la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-12: de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-13: khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-14: skyes bu dam pa mchog skye bar //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-15: rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-16: rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54a-17: rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-0: mchod pa yangs pa @54b bgyis bgyis kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-1: ma nges sems kyis bgyis gyur gyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-2: gang yang yongs su bsngo ma bgyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-3: bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-4: 'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur; ;bdag gis bsod nams che bsags na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-5: ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-6: tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-7: gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-8: 'on te nyan thos dngos por ram //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-9: rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-10: de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-11: lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-12: dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di; ;rnam par chud gson ma byed cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-13: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-14: smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-15: byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-16: 'jig rten rnams kyi don kyang gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-17: de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-19: thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-20: rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-21: ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-22: de don bdag la bstan du gsol //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-23: byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyis shing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-24: thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-25: de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-26: de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-27: rgyal po chen po shes par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:54b-28: rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-2: 'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-3: gang gis smon lam ci btab pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-5: rgyal po ngas kyang sngon chad ni //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-7: sems can kun la phan don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-8: ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-9: smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du; ;ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-10: byang chub dam pa ngas thob pas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-11: nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-12: rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-13: mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-14: gal te spyod pa spyad byas na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-15: khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-16: thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-17: rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-18: 'jig rten kun gyis mngon sum du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-20: 'khor ba tha ma med pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-21: sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-22: de srid sems can phan don du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-23: spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-25: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-26: 'gro ba thams cad mgron gnyer te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-27: dbul zhing phongs pa dgrol bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-28: de ring phan chad gal te yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-29: bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55a-30: phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-0: sangs rgyas @55b thams cad bslus par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-1: byang chub nam zhig thob par du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-2: tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-3: phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-4: de ring phan chad mi bya 'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-5: tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-6: sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs su gtang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-7: tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-8: sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-9: bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-10: 'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-11: phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-12: sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-13: tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-14: sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-15: phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-16: bdag gi ming ni thos par bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-17: bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-18: sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med; ;bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-20: lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-21: rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-22: yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-23: mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-24: ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-26: bden pa des ni sa 'di yang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-27: rnam pa drug tu g-yos gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-28: bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-29: ma nor yang dag smras she na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:55b-30: bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-2: bdag la gal te g-yo med cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-3: de bzhin tha ba med ce na //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-4: mand'a ra ba'i me tog bzang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-5: bden pa des ni char du phob; ;yang dag don du nges pa yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-6: tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-7: phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-8: bye ba'i zhing rnam rab tu g-yos //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-9: de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-10: sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-11: me tog mand'a ra ba dag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-12: mi 'greng bdun srid bab par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-13: rgyal po de yi rjes bslab ste //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-14: srog chags bye ba nyi shu yi //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-16: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-17: de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-18: nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-19: rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-20: byang chub tu ni zhugs par gyur //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-23: khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56a-25: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems @56b bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gangg'a'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-1: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang bskal pa gangg'a'i klung drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-2: de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-3: 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-4: 'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-5: 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-6: bar 'ga' yang des bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:56b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-0: de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sa @57a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-1: sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-2: de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-6: shes rab la yang dag par btsud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-7: thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-8: yongs su spyad par byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-9: thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyings zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-12: de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-13: sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-14: de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-16: sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57a-17: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-0: gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su @57b rdzogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongs su rdzogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-2: sangs rgyas kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-4: ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-5: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-6: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-8: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-9: yang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-11: des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-15: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs zhes bya ba ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-18: de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-19: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o; ;nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-21: de ltar nam mkha' dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:57b-25: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-2: gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-6: gang rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-10: gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-15: rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-19: khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa'am mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-26: chos gang rtag pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-27: mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-35: de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa yang med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-36: 'grib pa yang med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-37: yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-39: des chos cis yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-41: des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58a-42: gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe mi rtog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-2: rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par byed pa med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-3: gang yongs su rdzogs pa'am 'grib par med pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-4: mnyam pa nyid do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-6: gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-11: rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-12: rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-15: da ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang bdag gis byang chub thob par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-25: sems can dben pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-27: gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:58b-29: gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-1: la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-9: mnyam pa nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-10: de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-13: 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-14: gang du yang 'gro ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-18: mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-19: stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste; stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-21: gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-22: ci'i phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59a-25: khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-0: sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas @59b byang chub kyang ming tsam ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-1: yid las byung ba ma yin pas byang chub ces bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-4: ming gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-5: dben zhing byed pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-8: de las bsam nas bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du sems bskyed pa med do //
