K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-14: gang la skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-15: mngon par rtogs par bya ba yang gang zhig yod /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-17: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-19: rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa 'di ni; mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-20: ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi bskyed mi 'gog pa de ltar rtogs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-21: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-23: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-26: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-27: yang dag pa'i lta bas zhugs te mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-29: tha dad par mi byed cing rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:59b-30: mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-1: 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang mngon par zhen pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-2: sems la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-3: mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-6: thob pa zhes bya ba de ji lta bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-10: rgyu ba med pa'i tshig ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-11: de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-12: de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-14: 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin pa de ni; brjod par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-17: gnas med cing rgyu ba med pas de'i phyir brjod par mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-20: thob pa med pa las thob pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-22: chos gang yang thob pa yang ma yin /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-23: ma thob pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-0: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pas legs par @60b bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-6: khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-9: gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-12: khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba ma yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-18: gang mngon par dga' ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-20: gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-22: sred pa gang la yod pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-24: skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-25: gang la tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-28: kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:60b-29: byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-0: 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig @61a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-2: de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thugs su chud pa mngon sum du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyis brjod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-9: khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam ston cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-10: de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-12: khyod las smon lam de dag thos na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang spyod pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi zlog ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61a-17: sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud @61b de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-2: de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-3: rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam de dag thos nas kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la de bzhin nyid du nan tan bgyid na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-5: de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-8: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-9: nam bdag gis phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang dag par btsud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-11: bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-12: bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:61b-13: de bzhin du bdag gis tshul khrims dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-3: shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-5: bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong bde srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-6: nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-7: zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab po //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-8: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig mthong bar gyur snyam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-0: skyes bu la @62b la zhig skyes par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-1: des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdul phra rab tu brlags shing bshig ste thal bar byas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-4: rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag rtsis shes pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-5: rtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-7: stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-11: bye ba phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-13: bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-15: bye ba stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-17: bye ba brgya stong 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-21: tshad gzung bar nus sam; gsol pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:62b-29: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas rnam par bltas na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-0: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig @63a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-1: la gangg'a'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyi tha gru yangs pa yongs su ma grub cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-2: rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas spras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-3: srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par mi bgyi bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-5: gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad tsam gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-6: byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas shing khyab par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63a-7: ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-0: gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung bdag 'dug pa'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag tu dang zhing sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur @63b cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-1: ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-3: gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang ye med par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-5: byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-8: tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de gang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-11: skyil mo krung bcas par brdzus te byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de shin tu dag par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag grangs med par gshegs shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa de dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-15: byang chub sems dpas yongs su gang bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:63b-16: ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par @64a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-1: bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-12: sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-14: da ltar byung ba'i dus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-15: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64a-17: mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-0: mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla @64b na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-1: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis dga' pa'i zas dang ldan par gyur pa'i smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-7: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-8: de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g-yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod mngon du byung bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-9: snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-10: sems can dbul zhing phongs pas sdug bsngal ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:64b-11: mgon med par gyur pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-0: yi dvags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag lo stong phrag du mar yang mchil ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang mi snyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim par ma byas par bdag nyid kyis bza' @65a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-2: zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-3: de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par 'gyur te; rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing nam mkha' las mchi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-4: rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas kha zas de las de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang phul /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-5: sems can phongs shing ltogs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-6: mgon ma mchis pa rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-7: yi dvags kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyang yongs su tshim par bgyis nas de dag la chos bstan te skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-8: ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-11: bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65a-12: bsam pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa rung ba dag byang bar gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-0: gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di @65b ltar bdag cag gi gos 'di lta bu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar bdag nyid kyis yongs su spyad pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-2: snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas de dag gi sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu mchis shing gos de dag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bkab ste slar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas ci dga' ba'i gos rin po che la spyod par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-3: ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-5: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-7: yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur pa'i sgra ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:65b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni gzugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-4: reg bya yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-5: ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-8: gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-10: smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-11: dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-13: 'jig rten gyi khams de phyogs gang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-1: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gang zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-2: nor bu rin po che du mas spras pas rin po che kun du bstan pa dang 'dra la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-3: rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na dkon la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-4: sngon chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-5: de dag gi ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-7: snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-8: dngul las grub par mthong bar dga'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-9: snyam na yang dngul las grub par mthong la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-10: gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-11: de bzhin du beed'urya las grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-13: mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-14: rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-16: de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-18: ma ka ru las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-19: ta ka ru las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-20: ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-21: tsandan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:66b-22: tsandan dmar po las grub pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-1: rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-2: phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od byung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-4: byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od byung bas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-9: sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-10: gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-11: tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha phye ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-14: gang dus dang tshod rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-0: byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams @67b gzhan dag tu mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan bltar mi gda' ba bye bar khrag khrig phrag 'bum rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-2: sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-3: gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-9: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de blta bar 'tshal lam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-15: gang dag der sangs rgyas la blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:67b-16: mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom mam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-0: chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs @68a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-2: bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-3: ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-4: de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-5: gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-6: tshul dang 'dra ba ste; sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na; sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-7: gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-8: gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-9: sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-10: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-14: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-16: gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68a-17: gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-0: 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches @68b mang du bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems can gyi don de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-4: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-14: mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-15: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-17: de skad ces brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-18: de'i mod la srog chags bye pa khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-19: sems can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:68b-21: bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-1: 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad med grangs med pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-6: gnas kyi rnam pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-7: snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-9: zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-12: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te rnam pa gzhan dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-13: gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-14: de bas kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69a-16: bdag gi smon lam gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-0: bcom @69b ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-7: de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-14: mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i tshad rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:69b-18: phyi na lus pa de gnyis gang mang bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-5: mi des skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshags pa'i tshad rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de tsam du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-7: chu'i lhag ma ji snyed cig yod pa de tsam du ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan la la la mnga' bar gyur tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70a-13: da ltar la la na de lta bu mnga' ba lta yang bzhugs sam; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-0: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangg'a'i klung bye ba phrag @70b brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-1: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-5: da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-6: lhag chad med do; ;rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-7: byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gos bgos pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-8: 'jug pa chen pos zhugs pas gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas pa bzhi yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:70b-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang 'di dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-1: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na mchis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mnga' ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-6: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:71a-10: de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:76b-23: chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:76b-24: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:76b-25: gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-3: chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-4: chos la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-6: 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-7: de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-8: chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'gro pa grub pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-10: gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-11: ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang ston la 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-12: chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-13: chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-14: byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-15: gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-16: chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-19: gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-20: chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77a-22: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-0: tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan @77b pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun cus mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-1: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-2: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-4: nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-5: lha dang mi'i skye rgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-6: chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-13: ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:77b-16: khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad @78a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-3: khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-6: gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-7: gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-8: gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-9: gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o; ;gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-14: zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-15: rigs kyi bu; de ltar yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-16: su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78a-19: khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-0: ma yin @78b te; de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-3: byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-6: gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-9: ming gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-10: dben zhing byed pa med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-12: stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-16: khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-37: yul ma ga dha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs nas rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:78b-38: til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de lta bur ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang @79a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-3: phyi na til gyi lhag ma lus pa ltar ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'dus par blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-8: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa la rigs kyi bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-9: rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-11: bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-12: bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-16: rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-18: rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79a-19: tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te thal bar byas pa de las skyes bu la @79b la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-1: skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad du bkod par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-2: de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-3: des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas tshul de bzhin du bor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-4: de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:79b-21: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-2: zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-7: bde bar gshegs pa; de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-11: skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-12: gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-13: gang dag las 'das te rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu brlags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-16: rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-17: rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80a-31: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni; 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-8: sems can rnams mos par 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-12: tshad gzung bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-14: rigs kyi bu; de bzhin gshegs pas ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-15: rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-19: 'bum phrag ni; 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-26: bye ba 'bum phrag ni; 'di snyed cig yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-27: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-32: 'di snyed cig yod do; ;mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-34: zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:80b-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-0: gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub @81a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-1: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-4: de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-5: yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; byams pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-8: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-9: sems can mos pa chung ngu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-11: brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi bskyed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-12: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-15: de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81a-16: 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-0: gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon @81b nur gyur pa byang chub gyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-3: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-7: de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-11: 'di lta ste; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-13: spyod pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-17: nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-26: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:81b-27: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-3: nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-7: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-9: rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-10: 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-11: nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-12: zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-13: zhes rnam par mi rtog go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-15: chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-20: bskal pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yid chad pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-21: nam mkha'i khams la skye ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-23: tshig pa'am; 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-25: nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-27: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82a-29: yongs su yid chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-0: gang la nam mkha'i khams zhes @82b bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-13: de bzhin du gang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang tshig pa med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-26: shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-27: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-28: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-29: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-30: lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-32: sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na; gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-33: klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-34: gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:82b-36: sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-2: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-3: zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-4: dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-7: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-9: klog gam; kun chub par bgyid dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-11: gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-12: gang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab bo; ;zhes sems bskyed pa des bsod nams ci tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-15: byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-16: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-0: rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis @83b tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-1: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-6: gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed dam; 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-7: zhes bya ba'i bar du sems bskyed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-9: bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-10: stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-11: brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-13: bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-14: bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-15: bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-16: bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:83b-22: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bu 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-0: de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting @84a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-1: nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-3: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gcig car du snang bar gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-7: ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-8: snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84a-15: de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-0: smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zungs @84b shig ;'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-1: byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-2: de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-4: rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-8: bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sengge'i sgra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-9: bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-10: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-12: sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:84b-14: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sengge'i rtsal gyis mngon @85a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-2: phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-9: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-10: 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste; le'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-11: rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh'i lendra bo dhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-13: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-038-001:85a-14: skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa //
